00055   class ModuleTester {
00056   public:
00057 
00059     ModuleTester();
00069     ModuleTester(FILE* out, double thres, double rrange);
00070     ModuleTester(double thres, double rrange);
00071 
00072     virtual ~ModuleTester();
00073 
00078     Idx<double> test_jacobian(module_1_1<state_idx,state_idx> &module, 
00079                               state_idx &in, state_idx &out);
00080 
00088     void test_jacobian_param(parameter &p, 
00089                              module_1_1<state_idx,state_idx>& module, 
00090                              state_idx &in, state_idx &out);
00091 
00093     double get_acc_thres() const;
00094 
00096     void set_acc_thres(double acc_thres);
00097 
00099     double get_rrange() const;
00100 
00102     void set_rrange(double rrange);
00103 
00105     FILE* get_out() const;
00106 
00108     void set_out(FILE* out);
00109 
00110   private:
00111     // accuracy threshold
00112     double acc_thres;
00113     // ranfom initialization range
00114     double rrange;
00115     // output stream
00116     FILE* out;
00117     // jacobian from fprop
00118     Idx<double> jac_fprop;
00119     // jacobian from bprop;
00120     Idx<double> jac_bprop;
00121     // jacobian from fprop wrt param
00122     Idx<double> jac_fprop_param;
00123     // jacobian from bprop wrt param
00124     Idx<double> jac_bprop_param;
00125 
00126     Idx<double>* kk;
00127 
00128 
00134     void get_jacobian_fprop(module_1_1<state_idx,state_idx> &module, 
00135                             state_idx &in, state_idx &out,Idx<double>& jac);
00136 
00145     void get_jacobian_fprop_param(parameter &p, 
00146                                   module_1_1<state_idx,state_idx> &module, 
00147                                   state_idx &in, state_idx &out,
00148                                   Idx<double>& jac);
00149 
00154     void get_jacobian_bprop(module_1_1<state_idx,state_idx> &module, 
00155                             state_idx &in, state_idx &out,Idx<double>& jac);
00163     void get_jacobian_bprop_param(parameter &p, 
00164                                   module_1_1<state_idx,state_idx> &module, 
00165                                   state_idx &in, state_idx &out,
00166                                   Idx<double>& jac);
00167 
00171     void report_err(Idx<double>& a, Idx<double>& b, const char* msg);
00172 
00175     Idx<double> get_errs(Idx<double>& a, Idx<double>& b);
00176 
00178     void randomize_idx(Idx<double>& m);
00179   };

00184   class Jacobian_tester {
00185 
00186   public:
00187     Jacobian_tester() {
00188     }
00189     ;
00190     ~Jacobian_tester() {
00191     }
00192     ;
00193 
00194     // this function take any module_1_1 with a fprop et bprop implemented,
00195     // and tests if the jacobian is correct (by pertubation) 
00196     // (on a state_idx with 3 dimensions)
00197     void test(module_1_1<state_idx, state_idx> &module);
00198 
00199   };

00208     }
00209     ;
00210     ~Bbprop_tester() {
00211     }
00212     ;
00213 
00214     // this function take any module_1_1 with a fprop et bbprop implemented, 
00215     // and tests if the Bbprop is correct (by pertubation) 
00216     // (on a state_idx with 3 dimensions)
00217     void test(module_1_1<state_idx, state_idx> &module);
00218 
00219   };
